author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

An Ultimate, Ultimate Edition for Gears of War? Looks like it! John takes us through the new Gears of War Reloaded, discussing the technological upgrades over the 2006 original and the prior ultimate edition, before diving into how every version stacks up - including the fully unlocked 120Hz support, available on all consoles... even Series S!

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 - Introduction
02:14 - First Comparisons
05:36 - More Comparisons
10:00 - 2006 vs 2025
11:02 - Every Version Compared
13:39 - Performance Testing
17:30 - How Is it?
19:35 - Audio Testing
20:17 - Wrap-up
title: Gears of War Reloaded - DF Review - PS5/PS5 Pro/Xbox Series X|S/PC - The New Ultimate Edition?
